name: Gummibar: The Game
description:
Move over Super Mario, make room Donkey Kong, pack it up Pac Man – Gummibär’s in town! This fun jump and run arcade game features everyone’s favorite gummy bear. Play through all five levels (of increasing difficulty) to get on the high score board. Challenge your friends! Includes a radically awesome music to make the game more better! Play now!

Here is the trailer of the full version.
